trans-unit.source: Reads memory in a specified process

seg-source.mrk: Reads memory in a specified process

target.mrk: Reads memory in a specified process

trans-unit.source: Identifies an open handle of a process whose memory is read

seg-source.mrk: Identifies an open handle of a process whose memory is read

target.mrk: Identifies an open handle of a process whose memory is read

trans-unit.source: Points to the base address in the specified process to be read

seg-source.mrk: Points to the base address in the specified process to be read

target.mrk: Points to the base address in the specified process to be read

trans-unit.source: Points to a buffer that receives the contents from the address space

seg-source.mrk: Points to a buffer that receives the contents from the address space

target.mrk: Points to a buffer that receives the contents from the address space

trans-unit.source: Specifies the requested number of bytes to read from the specified process

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the requested number of bytes to read from the specified process

target.mrk: Specifies the requested number of bytes to read from the specified process

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes transferred into the specified buffer

seg-source.mrk: The actual number of bytes transferred into the specified buffer

target.mrk: The actual number of bytes transferred into the specified buffer

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information
